Subjective: Headache. 2 months. Increasing. Right side. Nauseous. No vomiting. Glare in vision. Prefer dark room. No fever; no cough; no shortness of breath. No smoking; occasional beer; no drugs. Student. 2nd year. No energy drinks; no coffee. Exercise 4 times a week. Run occasionally. Cycle occasionally.
Objective: BP: 120/80. Pulse: 50/min. Cranial nerves fine. Fingertip-nose test good. Arm and leg strength good. Romberg's normal. Vision: glare. Headache: right side.
Assessment: Migraine. Susp. Cluster headache. No signs of cauda equina.
Plan: Take pain relief as soon as symptoms start: paracetamol 4x2, ibuprofen if necessary
Come back sooner if symptoms worsen or change
